name: Argonus and the Gods of Stone: The Argonautica
detailed_description:
Included in The Argonautica DLC


  • An immersive walk-through audio book, narrated by Betsy Brantley (English ~ 3.5 hrs).
  • Argonus and the Gods of Stone Original Soundtrack by composer Rich Douglas.
  • The Concept Art of Argonus by illustrator Nabetse Zitro (~ 20 pgs).

Availability

Estimated game launch: Summer 2019. Be sure to follow Zojoi on Twitter and FB!

short_description: The Argonautica Add On includes an immersive audio walk-through narrated by Betsy Brantley (The Princess Bride and Who Framed Roger Rabbit), the game’s original score by composer Rich Douglas and a compendium of the game’s concept with art from Nabetse Ziro.
